Product Description

Neat Little Holder!

This car seat gap organizer box can help you become a neat holder!

Look No Further For Your Keys！

If you have problems losing things in your car seat gaps, the car seat organizer front seat storage box is for you. It not only prevents small items from falling between the seats but also gives you a place to put change, a pen, toll cards, and other necessary ‘car items’ and keeps them within reach. It is well-constructed and easy to install. Safe and reliable.

High Quality

Made of premium top-class PU and ABS material which is durable and is impact resistant. Interior velvet material increases friction to keep items from sliding and rattling.

Look No Further For Your Keys

Adds CONVENIENCE & SPACE for your keys, cards, money, charger, phone, and cosmetics，receipts. Interior velvet material increases friction to keep items from sliding and rattling.

Intimate Settings

These car gap filler organizers can make it easier for you to find the ‘car items’ you need on the road. The precise fit of the design transforms the organizer into several high boxes with storage compartments. Make your Armrest console organized and looks much cleaner.

Easy To Install

These car seat gap fillers with cup holders can be easily washed with water. Besides, the installation is relatively simple, no tools required, installation car seat gap filler just inserts the between car seat gap filler and console, Can find a suitable position.

Specification:

Product Color: Black Main Material: Flocking materials, PU Leather, and ABS Plastic Suitable: Not was suitable for car seat gaps wider than 0.6 inches(1.5 cm) and central console lower than the seat. Package size (L*W*H): 11.22in x 6.92in x 4.17in Product Weight: 1.91lb Package Content: 1 x Left Storage box 1 x Right Storage box 1 x Microfiber Cleaning Cloth 2 x Car Back Seat Headrest Hooks

Say Goodbye to Mess – If you have problems on losing things in your car seat gaps, the car seat organizer front seat gap filler is for you. It prevents small items from falling between the car seat gap, gives you a place to put change, pens, toll cards, and other necessary ‘car items’ and keeps them within reach.
New Version Car Seat Gap Filler – This car seat organizer has a good texture that feels like a baby’s skin that is fine and smooth. The car storage organizer front seat is made of high-quality black ABS plastic and PU leather that cannot break, slip, bend or leave any scratches. With a velvet material pads that can prevent items from sliding and rattling.
Fashion Design and Driving Safety – This front seat gap filler will help you create a neat and clean environment. This seat gap filler fits the car seat gaps. Because it will not shake when you brake suddenly, and it is not too big to waste your car seat space. The new design added red stitching which adds to the overall appearance. Make your car more outstanding among friends.
Perfect Size Car Storage Organizer- Not suitable for car seat gaps wider than 0.78 inches(2 cm) and central console lower than the seat. The size of the car seat gap organizer is 10.23 x 6.49 x 2.95 inches which is suitable for most vehicles. The cup holder can fit cups up to 2.75 inches in diameter. Just like the size of aluminum Coca-Cola. Please measure the distance between your seat and the console carefully before you purchase.
Excellent Service – 2 car seat back hooks and 1 microfiber cleaning cloth as the gift. We provide one year of free replacement of this car seat gap filler with cup holder and 6 months of quality assurance. Please rest assured to buy. If you are not 100% satisfied with your order, please email us directly, we promise to provide every customer with quality products and services.

Product Description

Beiz Gold Desk Organizer with Sliding Drawer, 1 Tray and 5 Vertical Slot Sorters

Enjoy clean and exquisite life to the fullest with Beiz, we put users at the center of our decisions and design products that address life’s needs and help you make the most of your daily activities

Do you want a multi-function desk organizer that can store, clean and tidy desktop?Do you want your work area to be a pleasant place that reflects your bright and glamorous personality？Do you want to change your desktop from a boring space to a fashionable display area?

Beiz gold desk organizer can give you all you need

Material: Metal

Dimensions: 12.6″L x 9.1″W x 11.8″H

Compartments : 5 upright sections and 1 tray with a 3 sections drawer

Shipping Weight: 1.1 LBS

Package: 1 x Gold workspace organizer

Beiz Desk Organizer Keeps Your Desk Organized

Creating extra storage space virtually anywhere by allowing you to add storage vertically

Gold-colored office accessories are just the thing to elevate your workspace and give it the feeling of an executive office. At the same time, it also cleans your desktop and improves efficiency

Adding a touch of gold to even mundane objects like your office supplies makes them feel a little more glamorous boosts warmth and elegance. We’re here with the perfect gold office supplies to make your office feel a little more luxurious

Trendy Gold color design Metal construction and meshes material, durable and simple Easy to assemble with no tools required Easy-slide drawers Powder-coated metal to prevent rust and scratches

【Eye-Catching Gold Desk Organizer】Beiz gold-colored desk accessories are just the thing to elevate your workspace and give it the feeling of an executive office. A touch of gold, can go a long way to elevate the look of your workspace and improve your mood, and make you more attractive
【3 in 1 Pefect Combination】Compared with the simplicity of ordinary file organizer or desk organizer, the mesh desktop file organizer has vertical and horizontal storage space – 5 vertical sorters and 1 side load letter tray, and a 3 compartments drawer(can be used independently)
【Durable Material】 The gold desktop file organizer is made of strong mesh metal with a smooth, durable, and rust-resistant ABS coating. It has rounded edges so that picking up items won’t hurt your hands
【Easy to Install】 The gold office organizer is easy to put together, and you can do it in seconds without any tools or screws. The user manual will show you how to do it. It also has 4 soft pads on the bottom to keep the desk from getting scratched
【Considerate Customer Satisfaction】The patent number is D935,524. Beiz provides professional customer service before and after purchase. We’ll do our best to take care of your needs and questions. What you can get a high-quality gold desktop organizer and friendly customer service

From the brand

Lusso Gear Family Favorites

Auto Organization Caddy: A multifunctional car and trunk organizer will help you declutter your floor and passenger seats. This foldable backseat automobile holder gives extra storage to any car in a matter of seconds.
9 Storage Pockets: These Car Organizers offer 2 spacious main bag areas, 1 secure rear zipper pocket, 4 built-in cup holders, and 2 additional front-facing mesh pockets to keep any car interior, console or carseat organized.
Secure Safety Handles: The Lusso Gear Car Organizer comes equipped with a set of 2 handles, comfy enough for small and large hands. Your car’s side and middle seat belts can be clipped through for extra road safety.
Driver’s Best Friend: The uses are endless. Use as a toy or snack tray, a mobile office, or for storing police gear. This collapsible car seat storage organizer can do almost anything.
Built to Last a Lifetime: Every Lusso Gear accessory proudly comes with a lifetime warranty. If you encounter any issue with your Lusso Gear Organizer, simply let us know. We’ll work with you to make it right.

Easy-Carry Handles

Two ergonomic carry handles make it simple to bring the Lusso Gear Car organizer (and everything inside it) just about anywhere.

Collapsible Design

Organizer folds flat in an instant thanks to a space-saving design, allowing for easier transport and convenient storage when not in use.

Secure Safety Straps

Convenient straps allow you to safely and securely clip your organizer into your vehicle seat belt so it stays in place, even during sudden unexpected stops.
